name: Sanitizer Man
description:
Sanitizer Man is a game where you play as a man made of sanitizer who is helping humans by killing deadly germs.

You fill face total 20 waves of germs, and with each wave you survive, germs will keep getting stronger and numbers will keep increasing. 

To face such deadly germs, you have different  types of abilities:-

-> Simple Attack ( this will fire balls of sanitizer from your mouth)

-> 360 degree Firing ( player will fly and rotate while firing balls of sanitizer)

-> Sanitizer Rain ( balls of sanitizer will fall from sky around the player and will damage any germs it hits)

-> Smash (Jumping and smashing the ground will shake the world and damages the germs)

-> Shield (a protective shield will appear around the player and will block everything)

-> Healing power (as germs can kill sanitizer man it is important to heal oneself) 

-> Sanitizer Man itself (as sanitizer man is the source of holy sanitizer who is protecting us from deadly germs, sanitizer man can damage any germ he come into contact but will also receive damage doing it).

Since, these are power full attacks, so our sanitizer man needs power that is "Sanitizing Power". 

Using any ability except "simple attack" will cost some sanitizing power according to its effect. 

-> 360 degree firing will cost 2 sanitizing power.

-> Sanitizer Rain will cost 10 sanitizing power.

-> Smash will cost 20 sanitizing power .

-> Using shield will cost 2 sanitizing power after every second.

-> Healing will cost 3 sanitizing power.

To face those deadly germs you have to keep upgrading your powers (i.e. Health, Damage, Fire rate, Sanitizing power slot).

Every upgrade starts from the requirement of 50 sanitizing power and as you upgrade, the requirement of sanitizing power for next upgrade will increase.

-> Starting health is 200 and as you upgrade your health, it will increase by 50 till it become 500.

-> Damage is the damage given by each sanitizer ball to the germs also when sanitizer man come in contact with any germ. 

-> Upgrading fire rate will increase the firing speed of sanitizing balls in simple attack. The faster balls are fired the more balls will be fired and more damage it will do to our enemies.

-> Sanitizing power slots, it is how much sanitizing power you can posses. You will need more sanitizing power to upgrade your powers and use more and more abilities.

Different flavors of our Sanitizer Man:-

In this game flavours are equivalent to skins. They are all locked initially, to unlock them you have to play the game. 

Some flavours unlock when you pass certain waves and some unlocks when you have played the game for certain hours. 

-> Lemon Flavour (unlocks after you have passed 2nd wave)

-> Orange flavour (unlocks after you have passes 4th wave)

-> Strawberry flavour (unlocks after you have passed 6th wave)

-> Litchi flavour (unlocks after 8th wave)

-> Green apple flavour (unlocks after 10th wave)

-> Rose flavour (unlocks after 12th wave)

-> Cotton candy flavour (unlocks after 14th wave)

-> Lavender flavour (unlocks after 16th wave)

-> Floral flavour (unlocks after 18th wave)

-> Peach flavour ( unlocks when you have played the game for 1/2 hr)

-> Cookies and Cream flavour (unlocks when you have played the game for 1 hr)

-> Grapes flavour (unlocks when you have played the game for 1.5 hr)

-> Rainforest flavour (unlocks when you have played the game for 2 hrs)

These are all the flavours available for your to play with.

All the best with the game, and I hope you will enjoy it. 

Also always stay on your guard, you never know from where those germs will be approaching you
